channel.title: ARVA Product Feed
channel.description: Google Merchant Center feed for ARVA (livearva.com)

item.g:title: ARVA Atlas Sectional Cloud-Style Sofa - Modular Cloud Sectional Comfort (cloud sectional)
item.g:description:
Atlas Sectional is built for buyers searching for a cloud sectional look, but with better long-term support and structure than typical sink-in cloud couches.
Highlights: - Real back support with structured comfort for daily sitting - Performance-weave fabric designed for spill resistance and pet friendliness - Durable construction that holds shape over time - Tool-free modular setup with cleaner fit-and-finish - Built as a better-built cloud-style sofa for real-life use
